gist.headline: Seven new blooms
gist.blurb: We followed the pollen trails and discovered 7 amazing new apps built by our community. From storyboarding tools to coding assistants, the ecosystem is thriving!
gist.summary: Added 7 new community-built apps to the showcase, including SILENOS, FastStoryboard, and PollinCoder, discovered via usage analytics.
gist.impact: Users can explore a wider range of tools built on Pollinations, and creators get visibility for their work.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot as an explorer discovering new growth. Since these are 'discovered' apps, the bee finding 7 unique, distinct flowers or tiny structures in the garden fits perfectly.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny explorer's hat, discovering 7 unique, colorful pixel flowers blooming in a lush lime green (#ecf874) garden. Soft pastel gradient background (mint to peach). Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW APPS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
